VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Meridian Academy}.

VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Zenith Institute of Technology}.

NC.A: The average total student-teacher ratio between 1975 and 1977 was {lower} than between 1976 and 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1996, was the average total Student-Teacher Ratio higher or lower than between 1978 and 1979?

MSR.A: {Meridian Academy} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Silverhaven Polytechnic, Zenith Institute of Technology, Meridian Academy}.
